amendatorysection.catchline: Site and Building Development Fund; created; funding; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Site and Building Development Fund is created. The fund shall receive money pursuant to section 76-903 and may include revenue from appropriations from the Legislature, grants, private contributions, repayment of loans, and all other sources. The Department of Economic Development, as part of its comprehensive business development strategy, shall administer the fund. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.
Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
